item.description:
This place is awesome if you are into classic movies on dvd.

Everything from Charlie Chaplin, Orson Welles and comedies

like Laurel & Hardy, Abbott & Costello etc etc to some newer movies.

The coffee bar has a good coffee selection and some delicious cookies,

pastries, etc.

Here is the website http://www.bestvideo.com

www.bestvideo.com

I look forward to seeing some Unknown Zoners there.
item.how_to_find_us: I will have my Purple Back Pack. I will contact those who RSVP Yes.

group.name: Greater New Haven Unknown Zone Meetup Group

item.name: UZ: Best Video and Coffee Bar In Hamden
